answers.answer: I have a 15 months old as well and I'm just starting my 9th week of pregnancy, however I lost 2 pounds. Sorry, I'm not saying it to put anyone down, just trying to say that there are different pregnancies and so many things effect your body, like hormonal changes where some future moms release different quantities of hormones that effect them differently.No starvation! Just eat healthy foods, and less in quantity but more frequent, also snack a lot: keep little bags of celery, baby carrots, broccoli, almonds etc. and snack a lot. Plus, go on daily walks with your toddler. Put him in the stroller and go. We walk once to two times for about an hour each, he goes to playground, plays, runs and I go with him. Fun and healthy for both. Also, call your ob and see what they say, maybe you have pregnancy diabetes or something that makes your body want to ea and store food. Good luck!!!!
I have a 20mth old and I didnt show until around 14 weeks with my first. I am now 9 weeks and ive been showing since 6 weeks finding it hard to hide. Apparently this is common with the second one!
I am in my 13 week and I have lost 6 lbs and in my first I gained 14kg

Im 8 weeks my first baby is almost 3 and i can deffinetly say im showing a little even others have noticed however with baby 1 didnt show till around 22 weeks from what information  iv found its quite common with second bub :)

question: I have a 15 month old and am now 9 weeks along with my second baby.  The first time around I didn't start gaining until maybe 17 weeks along and gained 35 pounds total.  I've already gained 10 pounds this pregnancy and look like I'm showing ALOT HELP!
title: 2nd baby pregnancy weight gain
